short_summary: Department of National Defence to procure quantity 1 x Small Arms Shock Amplifier for delivery to QETE Gatineau, QC
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procure quantity 1 x Small Arms Shock Amplifier for delivery to QETE Gatineau, QC.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Notice Title
Small Arms Shock Amplifier

## Tender Reference
PW-22-01006598

## Request for Proposal
The Department of National Defence (DND) invites proposals from interested suppliers to procure a Small Arms Shock Amplifier (SASA) to meet the requirements outlined in this solicitation package.

### Project Overview

The DND requires one (1) Small Arms Shock Amplifier for delivery to QETE Gatineau, QC. The requested delivery date is sixty (60) days after receipt of order. This procurement is for a single unit with no security requirements.

### Specification and Requirements

For complete details of the required specifications and properties of the SASA, please refer to the attached documents:

* Original Request for Proposal: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/13/6c534353fcede3ce13d49293bd4298ab/en_rfp_w8746-236633-a_original.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/13/6c534353fcede3ce13d49293bd4298ab/en_rfp_w8746-236633-a_original.pdf)
* Amendment 001: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/28/4078bc94336a83eb11f0371ba87b1266/en_rfp_w8476-236633-a_amend_001_.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/28/4078bc94336a83eb11f0371ba87b1266/en_rfp_w8476-236633-a_amend_001_.pdf)

### Important Dates
* Publication Date: September 13th, 2022
* Tender Closing Date and Time: October 25th, 2022 @ 2:00 PM (EST)

### Additional Information

* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: World and Canada
* Regions of Delivery: World and Canada
